name: Unione Sindacati Agenti Rappresentanti Commercio Italiani
goal:
Usarci is the Italian Alliance of Regional Associations of commercial agents,
as well as independent sales companies. With more than 70 years of experience along
with deep knowhow around the topic of sales, USARCI successfully represents as a strong
partner the career and economic interests of its Member Associations as well as their
members (all commercial agents) at a national level all around Italy. Todayâ€™s Membership of USARCI consists of 20 Regional Associations, representing approximately 100,000 commercial agencies on a total of 220.000 agents in Italy.
Commercial agencies are independent professional providers of field sales and marketing
services to manufacturers or suppliers.
interests: Competition, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives: Commercio internazionale e politiche del lavoro
